Gains 1 charge whenever a visible enemy unit, including neutral creeps, uses an ability within the radius.

notes: Unlike regular heal amplification, Holy Blessing amplifies outgoing healing, not incoming healing. This means any healing provided by the owner gets ampified, regardless of who the target is. Vice versa, other sources of healing applied to the owner are not amplified.

name: Holy Locket
description: A prized relic long thought lost forever in a failed crusade.
tips: Holy Locket synergizes great with Mekansm, Guardian Greaves, Urn of Shadows and Spirit Vessel. Since it amplifies outgoing healing, all affected allies get healed for more.
